Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text: The food was delicious! We had spare ribs, fajitas and enchilada.  Very friendly staff.

Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text: I visited this restaurant with my girlfriend. It was empty on a Friday night at 7:30 but we thought we'd give it a go. My steak was quite good, however chips were undercooked. The enchiladas were not great. The food was quite expensive for the quality.

Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text: One of the worst meals I‚Äôve ever had. Food was cooked in the microwave and cost 19 Euros for one dish. This is a huge scam, don‚Äôt consider eating here. We had fajitas, enchiladas and chaliquile. All the dishes were cold in the center and very watery. Tourist trap! Scam!

Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text: Never in my life I had anything this bad! The only hot thing here was the plate, but the food cold, old , dry tacos, cooked instead of fried meat, cooked salad etc. And finally...that hair in a piece of chicken!!! ‚Ä¶

Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text:

Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text: Fine restaurant with very friendly staff. The food was good and tasteful. The prices were a bit high. It was a bit confusing that outside there was a sign: Steak 9 euro, which was for the restaurant next door.

Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text: The worst burrito I ve ever ate. And that for "only" 17 Euros. 8 of the 10 beers were not on stock so I had to take a corona. Which was served warm. After all we had wasted a lot of money for waiting on simply bad food. Not recommended.

Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text: I had fajitas and my man had a steak both dishes took 20mins and we're both cooked to perfection. Best meal I've had in a long time and was as fresh as you get. Go in and eat I promise it's so good. Tracy from Scotland

Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text: So we arrived at 7pm no other customers, one lady serving. We order 4 nachos and one enchalada. It took 45min to get the friggin nachoes. There were supposed to have chillie sauce, ONLY ONE DRIP!? she said it's underneath, nope. And chicken ‚Ä¶

Name: Agabi Santa Maria
Review Text: Lovely little place. Owners are very friendly. The argentinian steak is lovely: moisty and tasteful. Selection of mexican beers as you would expect. Decent housewines. I've been there multiple times. They are not always as fast as they should be but then again, it's no fast food joint and the atmosphere more than makes up for it!

Name: Agabi Santa Maria

Review Text: Worst place ever! Over priced. I‚Äôve never felt so scammed. The food was cold in the center and the portions were way too little for the hight price they have. They could at least put some salad in my plate! A lettuce and half a Romano at least! It‚Äôs a scheme

Review Text: A quiet and beautiful place, Mr. Hani (the owner of the restaurant), has exceptional experience in serving grilled steak. I would recommend visiting him
